reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress cute, comfortable, and flattering, particularly appreciating its perfect buttery yellow color and how it covers the tummy well. The material quality receives mixed feedback, with some finding it nice while others say it feels cheap. The fit and length also get mixed reviews - while some say it's a nice fit and the length is perfect, others mention it runs big on top and is too long. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering and pretty for short girls!
items.body: This dress was absolutely perfect for me to wear to my brothers middle of the summer, somewhat casual outdoor wedding. The light blue color was so pretty. The material is like a light weight cotton linen. The skirt did wrinkle pretty easily, but with this type of material that is kind of to be expected. The smocking really made it so the top part fit well and looked flattering. I am 5’0”, about 135-140 lbs (typically between a small and medium), with a large chest (34H) and small waist. I’m usually a small or medium depending on the style of the item. A small in this dress fit exactly how I wanted. The top hugs my body without looking or feeling too tight. The skirt is loose and flowy and hits right above the ankle. Read more
items.author: Sami

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Almost Perfect
items.body: I ordered a Large in the green, blue, and yellow. All the colors looked great and accurate. I'm 5' 4" 190lbs and a 34H chest. I carry most of my weight in my bottom and have wide hips. I would've sized down to a Medium, because the top seemed to have just a little extra fabric bunching, and would've given more support if it were more fitted. Even then, the large was still pretty supportive. I like that it's stretchy up top to create a custom fit for you, the bottom is loose and flowy. Overall, very flattering and pretty. The skirt material was a felt a little like paper or a rougher cotton, but wasn't uncomfortable. The only reason I didn't like the dress is, because I'm a bit of a perfectionist. The pointed part where the top meets the skirt was bumped out. It was like they didn't know how to sew that shape/small area, so the ruched fabric of the top created a small bump that stuck out off your stomach. One of the dresses was significant and one was barely noticeable, so I guess you just have to get lucky. Even the barely noticeable one bothered me though, so I returned and didn't re-order. Read more
items.author: Korra

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So pretty
items.body: So good! Color was great! So comfy too! Read more
items.author: Rose navarro

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too loose
items.body: The top was too loose on me and hit lower on my waist than the model, I’m 5’1”. The dress was cute but too loose and not form fitting on the top. The material also felt a little cheap. If they made a smaller size I would’ve tried that. Read more
items.author: cap

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Disgusting
items.body: I received a worn dress. I’ve never been so disgusted in my life. Had black scuff like stains on the sleeves and a huge yellow stain on the skirt. Not worth it. Read more
items.author: kimberly c

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality is excellent
items.body: Love its very flattering and fits true to size love Read more
items.author: B. Lee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size down if unsure
items.body: It's a beautiful dress. Great material. I might suggest sizing down. Read more
items.author: Taumi Rai

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Flattering & Comfortable
items.body: I absolutely love this green maxi dress! It’s so flattering while still being loose and comfortable perfect for staying cool in the Texas summer heat. The fabric is light and breathable, and the flowy fit makes it feel effortless and chic. It’s easy to dress up with accessories or keep casual for a laid-back day out. The color is gorgeous too fresh and vibrant without being too bold. Definitely a new go-to in my summer wardrobe! Read more
items.author: Caroline H.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Blue, Army Green, Black, Dark Green, Light Blue, Red, Rose Red, Lake Blue, Wine Red, Pink, White, Beige, Royal Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
